channel.title: Nepharion - [SPAWN] [CUSTOM SETS] [Flawless PK'ing abilities] [SPAWN WITH ECO]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/espxmmE.png[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] Website http://nepharion.com [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] Play Now http://nepharion.com/play.html [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/jfx7v4.png[/img] Download http://nepharion.com/client.jar
Nepharion and its community is back! After some much needed re-thinking of the private server era, we have returned the three-year Nepharion project! Our team has carefully planned the execution, of what we believe to be, the best formula for an active PKing community. Our goal with the continuation of Nepharion is to bring the community a self-sustaining wilderness in which the danger of the ENTIRE wild is brought to life once again. The content of Nepharion is designed to form a give and take process that brings forth an active PvP base, clan community, and in turn the closest resemblance to the original wilderness.
With an active community of already 100+ active members whom have reunited with us, and a active staff team we are looking forward to the future of Nepharion and look forward to seeing you there also! We have very unique features such as saving a custom set and spawning it again whenever! You also automatically receive 1M coins after killing another player. A killstreak system which alerts everyone online is added.
[size=12pt][font=impact]Features:[/font][/size] • 614 Look • 633 Characters • 714+ Items • 602 Animations & NPC's • 508 Maps & Objects • PVP Item Loot System • Kill Streak System • Unique Kill Streak Point Shops • 3 Amazing PKP Shops • Brilliant Combat System • Perfect Item Switching • New Hitmarks With Critical Hits • Fully Working Ancient Curses • New Bank & Shop Interfaces • Fast Loading Client With Low Memory Usage • Custom Sets With Unique Interface • Killstreak System Which Alerts Everyone Online Your Killstreak Or If You Lost It • 1M Goes Directly To Your Bank After Killing Someone, Spend Coins At Shops • Loyalty Titles • Instant PK'ing • Spawn Sets Interface • Flawless Combat With Great Switching
[size=12pt][font=impact]Future Updates: (Will be updated)[/font][/size] • Working Grand Exchange • PVP Outside The Grand Exchange Area • Squeal of Fortune. 1 Spin Every Hour. • Elite Donator Features • More Efficient Killstreak System • Killstreak Shop

item.description:
@Islayniggaz wrote:

[center][/center]
[center] Website
http://nepharion.com
Play Now
http://nepharion.com/play.html
Download
http://nepharion.com/client.jar

Nepharion and its community is back!
After some much needed re-thinking of the private server era, we have returned the three-year Nepharion project! Our team has carefully planned the execution,
of what we believe to be, the best formula for an active PKing community. Our goal with the continuation of Nepharion is to bring the community a self-sustaining
wilderness in which the danger of the ENTIRE wild is brought to life once again. The content of Nepharion is designed to form a give and take process that brings
forth an active PvP base, clan community, and in turn the closest resemblance to the original wilderness.

With an active community of already 100+ active members whom have reunited with us, and a active staff team we are looking forward to the future of Nepharion
and look forward to seeing you there also!
We have very unique features such as saving a custom set and spawning it again whenever! You also automatically receive 1M coins after killing another player. A killstreak system which alerts everyone online is added.

[size=12pt][font=impact]Features:[/font][/size]
• 614 Look
• 633 Characters
• 714+ Items
• 602 Animations & NPC’s
• 508 Maps & Objects
• PVP Item Loot System
• Kill Streak System
• Unique Kill Streak Point Shops
• 3 Amazing PKP Shops
• Brilliant Combat System
• Perfect Item Switching
• New Hitmarks With Critical Hits
• Fully Working Ancient Curses
• New Bank & Shop Interfaces
• Fast Loading Client With Low Memory Usage
• Custom Sets With Unique Interface
• Killstreak System Which Alerts Everyone Online Your Killstreak Or If You Lost It
• 1M Goes Directly To Your Bank After Killing Someone, Spend Coins At Shops
• Loyalty Titles
• Instant PK’ing
• Spawn Sets Interface
• Flawless Combat With Great Switching

[size=12pt][font=impact]Future Updates: (Will be updated)[/font][/size]
• Working Grand Exchange
• PVP Outside The Grand Exchange Area

• More Efficient Killstreak System

[/center]
